No. 594,

Misc.

SaMarion et al. v. McGinnis, Correction Commissioner, et al. Jacob D. Hyman for petitioners. Louis J.Lej-kowitz, Attorney General of New York, Paxton Blair, Solicitor General, William D. Bresinhan, Assistant Attorney General, and Julius L. Sackman for respondents.

C. A. 2d Cir. Certiorari

denied.
